entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
CA’s hospitalizations for #COVID19 are up 44% over the last 2 weeks. Our hospitals are still only at 8% capacity -- but that could quickly change.

We MUST take this SERIOUSLY. Wear your mask. Wash your hands. Practice physical distancing.

#YourActionsSaveLives
